name: FGeometryCollectionDebugDrawActorSelectedRigidBody
doc:
FGeometryCollectionDebugDrawActorSelectedRigidBody
  Structure used to select a rigid body id with a picking tool through a detail customization.

Id: Id of the selected rigid body whose to visualize debug informations. Use -1 to visualize all Geometry Collections.
Solver: Chaos RBD Solver. Will use the world's default solver actor if null.
